tgt_text: Inspect the operation of the private company.
The stage that was built fast.
Build a brightly lit stage.
The bacteria that is cultivated carefully .
Cultivate tiny bacteria.
The documents that are reviewed carelessly.
Review important documents.
The building that was demolished slowly.
Demolish the dilapidated building.
